gemini_config.system_instruction: Build a comprehensive text analysis tool using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Create a clean interface with text input area and results dashboard. Implement word count, character count, and reading time estimation. Add readability scoring using multiple algorithms (Flesch-Kincaid, SMOG, Coleman-Liau). Include keyword density analysis with visualization. Implement sentiment analysis with emotional tone detection. Add grammar and spelling checking with suggestions. Include text comparison functionality for similarity detection. Support multiple languages with automatic detection. Add export functionality for analysis reports. Implement text formatting and cleaning tools.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Build a comprehensive text analysis tool using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Create a clean interface..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
